                       java.lang.String id,
                       int quantity)
                throws ItemNotPresentException
        Check if a player have an Itemizer item.
        Specified by:
        hasItem in interface IItemService
        Parameters:
        player - the target of your check.
        id - the id of the item.
        quantity - the amount.
        Returns:
        Return true if the targeted player have the item in enough quantity and false if he * haven't
        Throws:
        ItemNotPresentException - if the id does not exist
